version_description: - Minor bug fixes
- Audio/video experience optimized and bugs fixed
- Audio/video experience optimized and bugs fixed
- Audio/video experience optimized and bugs fixed
- Audio/video experience optimized and bugs fixed
- Audio/video experience optimized and bugs fixed
- Audio/video experience optimized and bugs fixed

[Emojis] The new on-screen emoji feature allows you to express yourself without saying a word.
[Speaker Spotlight] The person currently speaking will be displayed in a floating window for easy identification.
[Video Conferencing for 25 People] VooV Meeting supports video conferencing for up to 25 attendees at a time.
[Private Chat] Attendees can send private messages to each other. This feature can be disabled by the host.
[Virtual Background] You can customize your video background to protect your privacy.
[Meeting Controls]
Keep meetings safe and straightforward by forbidding uninvited people from joining a meeting.
Keep unwanted people out of a meeting by forbidding them from joining the meeting again after you removed them.
The host can set screen sharing permissions.
The host can stop an attendee's video at any time.
[Others]
Improved user experience with better audio quality and network performance.
Bug fixes.

[Waiting Room] Easily control who attends your meetings;
[Meeting Toolbar] Convenient meeting controls for the host ;
[Time Zone] You can now select a time zone when scheduling meetings;
[1080P HD Video] A better conferencing experience;
[Beauty filter] Touch up your appearance on iOS;
[Others] 
Additional annotation graphics; 
Mic off alert; 
Instant meeting notifications.

[Chat History] View chat histories when rejoining meetings.
[Recurring Meeting] You can now schedule recurring meetings.
[On-screen Comments] Chat with on-screen comments.
[Search] You can now search for attendees in chat.
[Malay] Malay is now supported.

[Chat History] View chat histories when rejoining meetings.
[Recurring Meeting] You can now schedule recurring meetings.
[On-screen Comments] Chat with on-screen comments.
[Search] You can now search for attendees in chat.
[Malay] Malay is now supported.

[Meeting History] View and search meeting & chat history.
[Waiting Room Notice] Notices can be posted in the waiting room.
[New Layout] Hide video-off attendees.
[Audio Mode] Reduce data usage with audio mode.
[Quick Reply] Reply on-screen comments quickly.
[New Emojis] New emojis released.
[Green Screen] Enhanced virtual background.
[Others] Better UI & user experience.

[Personal Meeting Room] A virtual meeting room with your own dedicated meeting ID.
[Meeting History] View and search meeting & chat history.
[Waiting Room Notice] Notices can be posted in the waiting room.
[New Layout] Hide video-off attendees.
[Audio Mode] Reduce data usage with audio mode.
[Quick Reply] Reply on-screen comments quickly.
[New Emojis] New emojis released.
[Green Screen] Enhanced virtual background.
[Others] Better UI & user experience.

[Personal Meeting Room] A virtual meeting room with your own dedicated meeting ID.
[Meeting History] View and search meeting & chat history.
[Waiting Room Notice] Notices can be posted in the waiting room.
[New Layout] Hide video-off attendees.
[Audio Mode] Reduce data usage with audio mode.
[Quick Reply] Reply on-screen comments quickly.
[New Emojis] New emojis released.
[Green Screen] Enhanced virtual background.
[Others] Better UI & user experience.

[Send Images] You can send images in Chat in a meeting.
[Auto-access] Hosts can allow attendees to automatically join the meeting from the waiting room.
[New Emojis] 12 new emojis.
[Calendar Sync] Meeting adjustments can be synced to your calendar.
[New Filters] 22 new cutting-edge filters to help better touch up your appearance.
[Others] Bug fixes.

[New Filters] 22 new cutting-edge filters to help better touch up your appearance.

[Send Images] You can send images in Chat in a meeting.
[Auto-access] Hosts can allow attendees to automatically join the meeting from the waiting room.
[New Emojis] 12 new emojis.
[Calendar Sync] Meeting adjustments can be synced to your calendar.
[New Filters] 22 new cutting-edge filters to help better touch up your appearance.

[Screen watermarks]
Supports watermarks on shared screens for enhanced security.

[Meeting QR code]
Supports saving and sharing meeting QR code.

[Calendar sync]
Supports email and app notifications to ensure you never miss a meeting.

[Multiple video layouts for iPad]
Supports multiple video layouts for iPad including 3 x 3, 4 x 4, and 5 x 5 grid for you to choose from.

[Others]
Bug fixes.

[Screen watermarks]
Supports watermarks on shared screens for enhanced security.

[Meeting QR code]
Supports saving and sharing meeting QR code.

[Calendar sync]
Supports email and app notifications to ensure you never miss a meeting.

[Multiple video layouts for iPad]
Supports multiple video layouts for iPad including 3 x 3, 4 x 4, and 5 x 5 grid for you to choose from.

[Others]
Bug fixes.

[Self invitation when scheduling a meeting]
Receive an invitation when scheduling a meeting for meeting reminders.

[Beauty filters]
More than 17 filters for users to choose from.

[Landscape mode for background]
Switch between portrait and landscape mode.

[Manually switch languages in the app]
Languages can be switched manually in the app.

[Message the host from the waiting room]
Send private messages to the host from the waiting room for quicker admission.

[ Meeting QR code]
Invite guests to your meeting with a QR code.

[Audio sharing]
The audio can be shared during screen share.

[Annotations can be cleared by the host]
Annotations from the attendees can now be cleared by the host.

[3X3 Layout]
Supports 3X3 layout for a better presentation.

[Breakout rooms]
Breakout rooms allow meeting participants to break into small groups for discussions. They will return to the main session when their discussions end.


[Rotate video on mobile]
The video can be rotated on mobile when viewing the main screen.

[Breakout rooms]
Breakout rooms allow meeting participants to break into small groups for discussions. They will return to the main session when their discussions end.


[Rotate video on mobile]
The video can be rotated on mobile when viewing the main screen.

[Breakout rooms]
Breakout rooms allow meeting participants to break into small groups for discussions. They will return to the main session when their discussions end.

[Rotate video on mobile]
The video can be rotated on mobile when viewing the main screen.

[Webinar now supported]
Users can now participate in large-scale webinars and interact with tens of thousands of attendees in real time.

[Realtime network status]
Users can now view their local realtime network status during the meeting session.

[Cast Screen]
One-click wireless screen casting is now supported with VooV Meeting Rooms.

[Preset Mic and Camera Before Joining Meetings]
You can now preset your mic and camera settings before joining meetings

[Split View on iPad]
You can now use Tencent Meeting and other apps at the same time with split view on iPad.

[Swipe to Switch Video Layout on iPad]
You can now swipe to switch video layout during meetings on iPad.
